title: Healthcare Analytics Dashboard
shortDescription: Comprehensive Power BI solution reducing reporting time by 35%
longDescription: Designed and implemented an automated analytics dashboard with real-time KPI tracking, department-level drill-downs, and predictive patient flow modeling for a healthcare facility.
challenge: Healthcare facility struggled with manual reporting processes taking 20+ hours weekly, limiting insight into patient outcomes and operational efficiency.
solution: Built a comprehensive Power BI dashboard with automated data pipelines, interactive visualizations, and predictive analytics for patient flow optimization.
outcome: Reduced reporting time by 35%, improved operational efficiency by 12%, and enabled 20% faster patient outcome tracking.

title: ML Customer Churn Prediction
shortDescription: End-to-end ML pipeline with 87% accuracy preventing $500K+ revenue loss
longDescription: Developed ensemble machine learning models with advanced feature engineering and NLP sentiment analysis to predict customer churn and enable proactive retention strategies.
challenge: Company experienced 15% annual churn with no early warning system, resulting in significant revenue loss and reactive retention efforts.
solution: Built end-to-end ML pipeline using ensemble models, implemented NLP sentiment analysis on customer feedback, and created automated prediction workflows.
outcome: Achieved 87% prediction accuracy, reduced customer churn by 12%, improved satisfaction by 10%, and prevented $500K+ in revenue loss.

title: IoT Solar Tracking System
shortDescription: Arduino-based intelligent solar panel system with 20% energy boost
longDescription: Engineered an IoT solution with light-dependent resistors, servo motors, and microcontroller programming for dynamic solar panel positioning based on real-time sun position.
challenge: Static solar panels lose 15-30% potential energy due to suboptimal sun alignment throughout the day.
solution: Built IoT system with Arduino, LDR sensors, and servo motors to dynamically track sun position. Implemented real-time data processing and automated maintenance alerts.
outcome: Increased solar panel energy output by 20%, achieved real-time position optimization, and implemented automated maintenance alerting.

title: Sales Performance Dashboard
shortDescription: Interactive Tableau dashboard with advanced customer segmentation
longDescription: Built multi-dimensional Tableau dashboard with customer segmentation algorithms, trend analysis, and cross-functional filtering capabilities for sales performance tracking.
challenge: Sales team lacked unified view of performance metrics, leading to missed opportunities and inefficient targeting strategies.
solution: Created interactive Tableau dashboard with customer segmentation, predictive analytics, and real-time sales performance monitoring.
outcome: Boosted analytical efficiency by 25%, improved targeting accuracy by 15%, and reduced insight access time by 40%.
